programming.title: ForEx Calculator
programming.description: Looking to convert currencies effortlessly? Our forex calculator offers instant and accurate conversions at the latest exchange rates. Whether you're a traveler, investor, or simply curious, streamline your financial calculations hassle-free with our tool!

programming.title: E-commerce Shop
programming.description: Welcome to our user-friendly e-commerce platform! Shop seamlessly through our wide range of products with intuitive navigation. Explore today for a convenient online shopping experience brought to life through stylish design and seamless functionality.

programming.title: To Do List App
programming.description: Presenting a sleek and intuitive Things To Do app website, designed for seamless organization and productivity. With its minimalist interface and user-friendly features, users can effortlessly create, manage, and prioritize tasks. Elevate efficiency and streamline daily routines with this indispensable tool, showcasing my proficiency in UI/UX design and web development.
